ticket.title: RFC-0029 REQ-0001 canonical economics profile and deterministic budget admission

tickets.reason: RFC-0019 CAC registry hardening must exist before economics profile gate bindings are admitted.

in_scope: Implement economics-constraint admission checks for boundary interaction classes.
Emit deterministic budget allow/deny traces with stable deny reasons.
Deny unprofiled authoritative paths by default.
Add deny-path coverage for missing, stale, or unresolved economics profile inputs.
out_of_scope: Digest-first selector closure and replay zoom-in behavior.

steps: Bind economics.constraint.profile digests to active epoch policy roots.
Implement deterministic serialization for budget decision traces.
Add fail-closed defects for unknown economics profile state.
Add integration tests and evidence extraction for budget-admission decisions.

criteria: Budget admission traces are deterministic and replay-verifiable.
Unprofiled authoritative requests are fail-closed deny.
Decision traces expose stable input/output and deny_reason fields.

notes.security: Missing or ambiguous economics profile inputs are non-admissible for authority-bearing decisions.
notes.verification: Include deterministic replay checks over serialized budget-admission traces.
notes.general: This ticket is the baseline RFC-0029 implementation ticket and prerequisite for selector, queue, and optimization tickets.
